title: Financial Basics for Rural Households
description: Simple lessons on savings, bank accounts, and avoiding fraud.

lessons.title: Why Saving is Important
lessons.content: Even small amounts saved regularly can help in emergencies like illness, crop loss, or school fees. Keep savings in a safe place like a bank, not in cash at home.

quiz.question: Why is saving money important?
options: So that others can borrow it easily

lessons.title: Opening a Bank Account
lessons.content: You can open a bank account with Aadhaar and basic KYC. Zero-balance accounts like Jan Dhan make it easy to keep money safe and receive government benefits directly.
